sentences: Hugh Steven James Mingay (born 12 December 1974), also known by his stage name Skoll, is a heavy metal musician.
Hugh has also been the bassist for the Norwegian band Ulver between 1994 and 1998 and was formerly a member of the band Ved Buens Ende, under his pseudonym Skoll.
Themes from William Blake's The Marriage of Heaven and Hell (Studio Album, 1998)
